content: Hi everybody, we've created new cheat sheets for STU3. The PDF will be published to our websites. If you want it right now, then please feel free to contact me and I will send it via e-mail.

I've published the STU3 cheat sheet PDF online, you can download it via this link:
http://tinyurl.com/stu3cheatsheet

Lloyd has also added a link to the STU3 cheat sheets to the FHIR wiki page:
http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR
For those in Baltimore: I do still have a few real paper copies of the cheatsheet with me, so if you want one, find me!
